EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_Welcome Nurture_Q119.1 - It’s a New Era for .NET Developers
EmailTemplate.subject: It’s a New Era for .NET Developers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The .NET renaissance is underway. .NET devs now have access to a growing community of open source projects that support resilient cloud-native web applications. Want to learn more? Check out the following links to see how Pivotal is helping developers work with new and legacy applications.
The .NET Renaissance is Happening Now. Here’s Why It’s a New Era for .NET <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-net-renaissance-is-happening-now-here-s-why-it-s-a-new-era-for-net-developers]]>
You’re Investing In .NET, and so Are We. Pivotal Is Now a Corporate Sponsor of The .NET Foundation. <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/you-re-investing-in-net-and-so-are-we-pivotal-is-now-a-corporate-sponsor-of-the-net-foundation]]>
Even if your application portfolio is tightly-coupled, sparsely documented or impeded by manual, tedious processes designed to minimize risk and adhere to compliance, Pivotal can get your applications to become ‘cloud-native’. Don’t hesitate - if you have any questions, feel free to reach out our transformation experts here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103.
